incident_updates.body: Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.
Start time : 26/04/2022 06:00 UTC End time : 27/04/2022 14:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : Water manifold replacement

Start time : 07/07/2022 22:00 UTC End time : 07/07/2022 23:00 UTC Service impact : Public network on this rack will be unreachable for 15 minutes at least Service improvement : The objective of this maintenance is to reload a network equipment

Start time : 11/07/2022 06:00 UTC End time : 11/07/2022 14:30 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing an electrical maintenance on our internal infrastructure.
Due to an imponderable we have to postpone the intervention to the following dates : Start time : 11/07/2022 07:00 UTC End time : 11/07/2022 09:00 UTC We apologize for the inconvenience caused

Start time : 04/07/2022 07:00 UTC End time : 04/07/2022 09:00 UTC Service impact : Servers in rack L113A24 will be unreachable during the maintenance Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement process on our water cooling system, we will be doing an internal maintenance on our cooling system

Start time : 11/07/2022 07:00 UTC End time : 11/07/2022 09:00 UTC Service impact : Servers in this rack will be unreachable during the maintenance Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be carrying out a maintenance on the cooling system of rack L105A01.

Start time : 12/07/2022 05:00 UTC End time : 12/07/2022 15:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : In order to maintain a continuous improvement of our cooling system, we are doing an internal maintenance on a cooling tank.
Start time : 13/07/2022 06:00 UTC End time : 13/07/2022 15:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : Modification of the power supply of 2 electrical cabinets for load balancing.

Start time : 13/07/2022 06:00 UTC End time : 13/07/2022 15:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : The purpose of this operation is to check and maintain that a UPS and its components are in good working state.
Start time : 13/07/2022 10:00 UTC End time : 13/07/2022 14:00 UTC Service impact : The Rack will be power down during the operation. Service improvement : Cooling System replacement

Start time : 14/07/2022 07:00 UTC End time : 14/07/2022 09:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be carrying out a maintenance on the cooling system of the rack L113B18.

Start time : 19/07/2022 06:00 UTC End time : 19/07/2022 15:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : As part of the continuous improvement of our infrastructure, we are doing electrical works on batteries in SBG3

Start time : 19/07/2022 06:00 UTC End time : 19/07/2022 15:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : As part of the continuous improvement of our infrastructure, we are doing electrical works on batteries in SBG3

Start time : 26/07/2022 20:00 UTC End time : 26/07/2022 21:30 UTC Service impact : As part of our partner's maintenance policy, the OVHCloud Connect services at TH2 and PA3 will be interrupted for a period of 2 minutes

Start time : 27/07/2022 06:00 UTC End time : 08/08/2022 15:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : Following our continuous improvement policy, we are doing a preventive maintenance on the UPS of room G117B.
Start time : 23/08/2022 06:00 UTC End time : 23/08/2022 15:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement: The objective of this maintenance is to carry out annual/curative maintenance of a UPS.
Start time : 10/11/2022 07:30 UTC End time : 10/11/2022 16:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : We will perform load tests on the generators.
Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.
